attributes.action: Force nhs trusts to adhere to the agenda for change ideal and make sure the staff get the band they deserve.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Trusts are not being fair in their banding of nursing staff. People are being clustered unfairly.  Agenda for change will not end for years and people are disillusioned once again. This is just like the grading system all over again. So Mr Blair how about some support for the hard working nurses and other support staff. Nurses are always short changed.
